intro: Pulmonaria picta, commonly known as the spotted lungwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Boraginaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive foliage, which features silver-white spots on deep green leaves. Pulmonaria picta is often cultivated in gardens for its ornamental value and ability to attract pollinators.
